title: Europeans stick by Ukraine, despite mounting challenges.
description: Inflation and anxiety over nuclear weapons may be eating into some popular support for the war, but key governments remain insulated from the pressures for now.
dc:creator: Jason Horowitz and Catherine Porter
media:description: James Cleverly, left, the British foreign secretary; Antonio Tajani, the Italian foreign minister; Secretary of State Antony J. Blinken; Catherine Colonna, the French foreign minister; and Annalena Baerbock, the German foreign minister, on Friday in Muenster, Germany, during a Group of 7 meeting.
